EmailTemplate.name: Aerowave Welcome Ltr
EmailTemplate.subject: Aerowave Service Is Now Active {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing Aerowave 100. Your activation is now complete for aircraft [enter tail number].
Once you have used your Aerowave system our Aerowave portal (https://portal.myaerowave.com) will be available for you as a tool to manage/review details for your active aircraft.
Please note: Before you will be able to log in to the portal the Aerowave system must be used and CDR (Call Data Records) created. We will email you again with your portal log in details as soon as there is reported usage and we are notified that your portal account has been created.
To prevent future emails from going to your spam or junk folder, you can ensure that you continue to receive this information from us by adding us to your contact list.
If you have any questions or need further assistance, please reply to XXXXX@honeywell.com. Please include your {!Case.CaseNumber} when sending your reply.
Thank you for your continued business.
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
